className: px-6 py-2 font-bold text-white rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-pink-500 via-purple-500 to-blue-500 bg-[length:200%_200%] animate-gradient-x hover:scale-105 transition duration-300
px-6 py-2 font-semibold text-white rounded-xl bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/30 shadow-lg hover:bg-white/20 transition duration-300

px-6 py-2 font-mono text-black bg-yellow-400 border-4 border-black rounded-none shadow-[4px_4px_0_#000] hover:translate-x-[3px] hover:translate-y-[3px] hover:shadow-[1px_1px_0_#000] transition-all duration-150
px-6 py-2 font-bold text-white bg-indigo-600 rounded-lg shadow-[0_6px_0_#3730a3] active:translate-y-[4px] active:shadow-[0_2px_0_#3730a3] transition-all duration-150

px-6 py-2 font-semibold text-yellow-100 rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-500 via-yellow-400 to-yellow-600 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,215,0,0.6)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(255,215,0,0.8)] transition duration-300

relative px-6 py-2 font-bold text-cyan-400 uppercase tracking-wider rounded-md border border-cyan-400 shadow-[0_0_10px_#06b6d4,0_0_40px_#06b6d4] hover:bg-cyan-400 hover:text-black hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_#06b6d4,0_0_60px_#06b6d4] transition duration-300

html: <button class='flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-2 font-bold text-blue-600 border-2 border-blue-600 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-600 hover:text-white transition'><svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='2' stroke='currentColor' class='w-5 h-5'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' d='M12 4v12m0 0l-4-4m4 4l4-4m-6 8h8' /></svg>Download</button>

<button class='flex items-center  gap-2 px-5 py-2 bg-pink-600 text-white rounded-full shadow-lg hover:scale-105 transition transform duration-300'><svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='currentColor' viewBox='0 0 16 16' class='w-5 h-5'><path d='M6.79 5.093L11.5 8l-4.71 2.907V5.093z'/></svg>Play Video</button>

<button class='flex items-center gap-2 px-5 py-2 bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-500 to-purple-600 text-white font-semibold rounded-lg hover:scale-105 transition duration-300'><svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke-width='2' stroke='currentColor' class='w-5 h-5'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' d='M4 4l16 8-16 8V4z'/></svg>Send</button>
